name: Cathens
description:
Discover the duality between being either a chonky buff cat or a agile mage cat in the streets of ancient Greece.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls

MoveWASD or arrow keysJumpSpaceAttackControl or left mouse buttonSwitch formsQ

This game was made by

  • Luna "RunicPixels" van Egdom
  • Kian "Baardus" Kreikamp
  • Daphne "Meowl" Zwarts
  • Danae Dekker
  • Maiko Steeman
